entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New-Wes-Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 1:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries later this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 14 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 this evening. Low minus 8 except minus 14 inland. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then south 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
